<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
        <XtraReportsLayoutSerializer SerializerVersion="17.1.4.0" Ref="1" ControlType="DevExpress.XtraReports.UI.XtraReport, DevExpress.XtraReports.v17.1, Version=17.1.4.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b88d1754d700e49a" Name="XtraReport" ScriptsSource="
private void XtraReport_BeforePrint(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e) 
{

	
	//Set pouchcounter visible / not visible
	int pouchCountTotal = (int)GetCurrentColumnValue("PouchCountTotal");
	
	lblPouchCountTop.Visible=false;
	lblPouchCountBottom.Visible=false;
	
	if (pouchCountTotal > 1)
	{
		int pouchCountCurrent = (int)GetCurrentColumnValue("PouchCountCurrent");
		
		if(pouchCountCurrent >1)
			lblPouchCountTop.Visible = true;

		if(pouchCountCurrent < pouchCountTotal)
			lblPouchCountBottom.Visible = true;
	}
}




private void DetailReport_DataSourceRowChanged(object sender, DevExpress.XtraReports.UI.DataSourceRowEventArgs e) 
{
	//double amount= Convert.ToDouble(DetailReport.GetCurrentColumnValue("CurrentAmount"));
}


private void label2_BeforePrint(object sender, System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e) 
{
	if (label2.Text!=string.Empty)
	label2.Text =ConvertDecimalToFraction(Convert.ToDouble(label2.Text));
}


private string ConvertDecimalToFraction(double amount)
{
	string result;
	bool hasDecimalPart = !(amount-System.Math.Truncate(amount) == 0);	
	
	if (hasDecimalPart)
      {
      	string wholePart = string.Empty;
                string fractionPart = string.Empty;

                if (true)
                {
                    int whole = (int)amount;
                    double decimals = (whole > 0) ? amount% whole : amount;

                    if (whole > 0)
                    {
                        wholePart = whole.ToString()+" ";
                    }

                    if (decimals == 0.25)
                    {
                        fractionPart = "1/4";
                    }
                    else if (decimals >= 0.3 && decimals <= 0.5)
                    {
                        fractionPart = "1/3";
                    }
                    else if (decimals == 0.5)
                    {
                        fractionPart = "1/2";
                    }
                    else if (decimals >= 0.60 && decimals <= 0.7)
                    {
                        fractionPart = "2/3";
                    }
                    else if (decimals == 0.75)
                    {
                        fractionPart = "3/4";
                    }
                }

                if (fractionPart == string.Empty)
                {
                    result = amount.ToString("0.00").TrimEnd('0');
                }
                else
                {
                    result = wholePart + fractionPart;
                }
		
            }
            else
            {
                result = amount.ToString("#");
            }
	return result;

}
